mapper.select: SELECT t1.travelSort, t2.stationName, t2.xPoint, t2.yPoint FROM t_road t1, t_stationinfo t2 WHERE t1.stationId = t2.stationId and t1.busNo = #{busNo} and t1.cityId = (SELECT cityId FROM t_city WHERE cityName = #{cityName}) and t1.direction = #{direction} ORDER BY t1.travelSort

select t1.realXPoint, t1.realYPoint, t1.licensePlate, t1.nowStation, t1.nextStation, t1.speed, t2.xPoint, t2.yPoint, t3.travelSort from t_bus_realrun t1, t_stationinfo t2, t_road t3 where t1.nextStation = t2.stationName and t1.licensePlate = #{licensePlate} and t3.direction = #{direction} and t2.stationId = t3.stationId and t3.busNo = t1.busNo and t1.cityId = (SELECT cityId FROM t_city WHERE cityName = #{cityName}) and t1.direction = t3.direction limit 1;
